name: Legend of Equip > Pants
description:
The Legend of Equip > Pants is a vintage 2013 pantsventure RPG for busy people who appreciate only the choicest, most delicious puns.

It takes place in an alternate universe where an old man in a cave would hand Link some wooden underwear instead of a sword (if there were old men living in caves). 

The game unveils itself as a series of brief episodes because who has the energy to stay invested in 40-hour long RPG plots anymore? I sure don't.
